body:
Hello all, I'm Hfisk.

I'm from OCN but I will now be joining Bad Company, as I have a fair few friends in there. 

Thought I'd share this to show a little of what I'm about.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mnsyr4PdXwM&feature=youtu.be

replies.body:
Hi guys sorry to inform you all this guy is a spam bot who is targeting mineman teams everywhere. He is not in our team and he will try and touch your kids, immediate action will be taken via booter and hopefully we can rid ourselves of scum like him. 

thank you
